name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Angel PEREZ, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Perez v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Angel PEREZ, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of October, 2008, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
959 A.2d 903
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Angel PEREZ, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al., Appellee.
